title: GET_TRAIN_STATE
content:
0x81B50033// GetTrainState
int GET_TRAIN_STATE(Vehicle train);Parameters:train: The train handleReturns: The trains current state`cpp
enum eTrainState
{
    MOVING = 0,
    ENTERING_STATION,
    OPENING_DOORS,
    STOPPED,
    CLOSING_DOORS,
    LEAVING_STATION,
}
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for GET_TRAIN_STATE
GetTrainState(vehicle)
